name: 14-in-1+ Outdoor Emergency Survival Gear Kit – Tactical & Adventure Ready
description:
In the heart of the Pine Ridge Forest, Jake and his teenage son Liam set out for a camping trip. A fierce storm left them lost in the snow, but Jake had the 14-in-1 Survival Kit. They used the glow-in-the-dark compass, firestarter, wire saw, flashlight, and thermal blankets to survive until rescue. This kit isn’t just gear—it’s peace of mind.
Kit Includes:
Multi-Function Compass – 360° glow-in-the-dark
Wire Saw – Stainless steel
High-Frequency Whistle – Dual hole
Waterproof Shockproof Case – Compact and lightweight
Saber Card Multi-Tool – 11 functions
Tactical Folding Knife – Stainless steel
Mini Keychain LED Light
Water Bottle Clip – Belt loop compatible
Tactical Flashlight – 3 modes
Emergency Thermal Blankets x2 – 82" x 52"
Fire Starter + Scraper
Multi-function Scraper – Secondary striker or opener
Emergency Tungsten Steel Pen – Writes and breaks glass
